survey_name: Post-Event Attendee Feedback Survey for Tech Conferences
survey_brief: This survey collects feedback from attendees of tech conferences to evaluate the event's organization, content quality, and overall experience for future improvements.

questions.question_text: How would you rate the overall organization of the conference?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity and ease of analysis. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.

script.question_text: How would you rate the overall organization of the conference?

questions.question_text: Which of the following sessions did you attend? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to capture session attendance. Include 'None of the above' for accuracy.

script.question_text: Which of the following sessions did you attend? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What was the most valuable aspect of the conference for you?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture qualitative insights. Ensure text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What was the most valuable aspect of the conference for you?

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the networking opportunities provided?
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale recommended for consistency with Q1.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the networking opportunities provided?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend this conference to a colleague?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no/maybe options for straightforward feedback.

script.question_text: Would you recommend this conference to a colleague?
